channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Big Pharma Cuts R&D, Sending Shudders Through Industry
item.description: Results from Charles River Laboratories, a provider of drug-discovery services to pharma companies, signal an era of cost cutting.

item.title: Eli Lilly blows past estimates, hikes guidance as Zepbound, Mounjaro sales soar
item.description: The success of Eli Lilly's weight loss and diabetes drugs Zepbound and Mounjaro caused the company to hike its guidance.

item.title: Goldman Sachs Wants to Be a Bigger Lender. It's Asking Insurance Companies For Help.
item.description: A big push into asset-backed loans is part of the bank’s plan to roughly double its private-credit assets in the next five years.

item.title: Restaurant Brands revenue tops estimates, fueled by Tim Hortons
item.description: Canadian coffee chain Tim Hortons was the restaurant company's strongest performer during the quarter.

item.title: A Slowing Economy's Silver Lining: Cheaper Gas
item.description: Fears of a slowdown and the summer whiplash in financial markets have dragged oil prices to their lowest level in months.

item.title: Siemens earnings beat estimates on strong demand for electrification, software
item.description: German industrial technology giant Siemens on Thursday posted better-than-expected quarterly operating profit and confirmed its full-year outlook.

item.title: These Stock Picks Were No Ticket to Paradise
item.description: Losing stocks outweighed the seven columnist picks that beat the S&P 500 during Heard on the Street’s annual stock-picking contest.

item.title: Warner Bros. Discovery stock falls as it writes down $9.1 billion, misses estimates
item.description: Warner Bros. Discovery reports earnings after the bell.

item.title: Office Loans Are Toxic. Apartment Loans Could End Up Worse.
item.description: Distress rates are rising for a type of loan that apartment flippers feasted on during the pandemic.

item.title: Sunrun sees market opportunity after SunPower files for bankruptcy, company's shares surge
item.description: Sunrun posted a surprise profit and sees opportunity to gain market share.
